description:
Great Block At A Great Price!
Situated in one if Cockatoo's most sought after locations is this lovely useable 1/2 acre.
Offering large cleared areas with all services available.
This is a great opportunity to build your new home in an ideal location.
Call today, inspection is a must.
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

DREAMING OF A LIFESTYLE CHANGE?
Commanding a dignified presence on an open and sunny 1 AND 1/2 ACRES, this period storybook chalet has all the modern comforts of today. Generously catering to the needs of a large, modern family with its 4 well placed bedrooms and 2 sparkling bathrooms (one with a bubbly spa bath). Enjoy evenings spent with family and friends in the huge open plan lounge with Coonara wood fire, dining zone and functional kitchen. There's also space for casual living with the rumpus room and home entertainment room. The beautiful deckings are a great vantage point for admiring your lovely outlook on warm Summer evenings. In addition to the peaceful and private location you'll take pleasure in the established yet low maintenance gardens and huge 6 car garage/barn with ample off street parking - the ideal access for tradespeople or horse lovers. A majestic lifestyle awaits your inspection.
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their schedule opening is advised.
Aidan Skipsey : 0417 369 888

COMFORT & CONVENIENCE
Nestled amongst established & colourful gardens is this much loved 3 bedroom cedar home on a private 1/4 acre allotment. Cathedral ceilings, exposed beams, immaculate presentation, 2 separate living areas & a timber kitchen is what you can expect to find & fall in love with. There is also gas heating, split systems heating & cooling, front & rear decking, double carport & a fenced yard for your kids or fury friends to enjoy. Positioned within walking distance to town, school, sporting facilities & transport - hurry to inspect this property, it could be your 'home, sweet home'!
Lana Maher : 0408 535 075

One For The Growing Family On Over 1 Acre....
Boasting 4 bedrooms plus study, 3 separate living areas & over 1 acre of almost FLAT land - you can be sure the whole family will love living here! The home offers comfort all year round with gas ducted heating, coonara wood fire & evapourative cooling plus there is an above ground pool which is solar heated for some summer fun! The timber kitchen offers dishwasher & double oven & the master bedroom offers ensuite & walk in robe. There is plenty of parking plus there is a large workshop which is approx 7.5m wide x 14m long which has concrete floor, power & remote door. With sealed road access & a location which offers easy access to Emerald -
you can be sure this home will tick all of your 'wish list' items, inspect today with confidence!
Lana Maher : 0408 535 075

"MILLIES PLACE"
Designed with the charm and feel of yesteryear and lovingly crafted from lime stone, this superbly unique home offers an abundance of features highly sought after and rarely unveiled.
A wonderful ambience greets you at the leadlight entrance beneath wrap around timber lined verandas with limestone paving afoot.
The open plan lounge and family room exude charm with parquetry floors accompanied by feature timber ceilings, a wood fire nestled into a magnificent limestone feature fireplace offering warmth and the enticement of lazy days, relaxing, whiling away time...
The ambience flows into the generous country style timber kitchen with sandstone benchtops and
terra cotta floor tiles which lead through to the hallway and 3 ample bedrooms all with Blackwood timber built in robes and a bathroom featuring a raised platform showcasing a claw foot bath. The limestone walls, which feature throughout the home, together with natural timbers create an exquisite sense of country calm.
Set to the side of the property and down a second driveway you will find the double garage with 2 roller doors and large workshop, while the triple carport sits beside the home behind the semi circular drive.
At the end of a no through road and on a level allotment of around 5660m2 of enchanting gardens, boasting timber decked gazebo, an outdoor undercover fireplace, a second extensive decked entertaining area and water tank this is a truly unique and inspirational property for the buyer seeking something special.
Barbara Heywood : 0448 805 896

Impressive In Every Way!
From the moment you enter this beautifully presented family home you will feel 'welcome'.
Renovated to perfection, the home offers open plan living, floating timber floors, new carpets & a modern kitchen which complements the soothing colour schemes throughout, creating a relaxing environment for family fun or entertaining in style. Large living areas set the scene for family gatherings around the open fire & with 4 bedrooms plus separate study or work from home office above the garage you can be sure there is plenty of space for everyone. There is also gas ducted heating, split system heating & cooling, coonara & a picture perfect view from every window of the privacy that surrounds. Set on over
of an acre which is fully fenced & boasting wonderful valley views across distant pastures & rolling hills, there is much to love about this property including the huge barn style garage with mezzanine level, sealed driveway, plenty of parking space, large outdoor covered entertaining area, water tank, landscaped gardens & childrens play area all set at the end of a no through road. This home will definitely impress you in every way!
Lana Maher : 0408 535 075

Build Your Dream Home On ¾ Of An Acre
This lovely
of an acre block is the perfect place to build your dream home. Offering sealed road access, all services available except sewer, a cleared home site and driveway plus a winter creek at the rear. All this within walking distance to Cockatoo footy oval and sport sporting facilities. Call today inspection is a must.
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

Everything You Need!
Offers Considered Over $345,000
If you must have a circular drive, carport, workshop plus extra parking and room for a caravan/boat and trailer, then arrange an inspection of this property now. Positioned at the end of a no through road on half an acre of immaculate and established low maintenance gardens, the country style log cabin home offers visitors a warm welcome. Providing 3 bedrooms (all with BIRs), central bathroom, kitchen with dishwasher and pantry, there is also a home office/study, a sunroom, plus separate spa room. Other features incorporate timber-lined walls, slate flooring, raked ceilings and feature stained glass. Extras include combustion wood and gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a large tank water supply in addition to the mains. Then there is the front verandah where you can sit back and enjoy a lazy afternoon listening to the peace and quiet – what more could one want!

WOW - 4 BED, PLUS STUDY WITH VIEWS!
Are you looking for that perfect home which offers enough bedrooms for the growing family, a large block which allows plenty of space for outdoor activities & of course, a view? This large home certainly offers plenty of space for everyone with 4 bedrooms, plus study & an enormous living room, separate dining room & large decking with rural views. Spacious kitchen, gas ducted heating, triple carport & a large 1/3 acre allotment completes the perfect setting for you & your family. Call us & inspect your new home today!
Lana Maher : 0408 535 075

Start Right Here!!!
This lovely cedar home offers fresh modern tones & enough space for the growing family!
Featuring 4 large bedrooms, master with ensuite & WIR, 2 separate living areas, gas ducted heating, stunning bathroom with spa bath & a stylish kitchen & meals area.
Outside you will find a covered entertaining area, established gardens, double carport & all this on a flat & useable 1/4 of an acre within walking distance to schools, shops and public transport. Call today inspection is a must.
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

Exceeding Your Expectations On 3/4 Of An Acre....
Set on a delightful 3/4 of an acre of beautifully landscaped & colourful gardens which feature a variety of flowering ornamentals, maples, ferneries & deciduous trees, is this brick home which is ideal for the growing family. The home features 2 large living areas, a spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, gas ducted heating & a crackling fire place, security system plus high ceilings & light filled living areas. The home offers a picture perfect view from every window of the private & peaceful surroundings plus there is a reserve at the rear, so you can be assured of your privacy. There are multiple outdoor entertaining areas which feature extensive paving & bluestone landscaped gardens plus there is a double garage with concrete floor & power & secure fencing to all boundaries. This property will exceed your expectations in every way, call us & inspect today!
Lana Maher : 0408 535 075

Quality, Character & Charm on 1 Acre
Renovated to an exacting standard & offering perfect presentation, this home oozes character, quality & a modern design.
Featuring an open plan kitchen with adjacent family/meals area, separate lounge, polished floorboards, gas ducted heating & large windows that provide private views of the garden, plus the added bonus of a wine cellar!
The French Doors open onto the covered entertaining area, which overlooks the swim spa/BBQ area - making this the perfect place to entertain all year round! Set on over an acre of lovely established gardens with a meandering creek & crown land at the rear.
Make this home yours, call today!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

Family Homestead
If spacious living & useable land is on your must have list, then make this gorgeous home a priority!
Situated on approximately 1/2 an acre, this large family home offers 4 bedrooms, separate study, formal lounge & dining room complemented by open fire place, batlic pine kitchen - perfect for any dinner party adjacent to spacious family/meals area.
An added bonus is the third living space, ideal as a rumpus room for kids or retreat for parents!
The main bathroom is a delight with pressed tin walls, timber vanity & genuine clawfoot bath.
Other features include verandahs all around, large 4 car garage/workshop, separate double carport, sealed driveway and all services are connected!
Inspect with confidence!
Russell Muir : 0408 177 413

Surprise Package!
This spilt level cedar weatherboard home offers fresh modern tones throughout that combine perfectly with polished timber floors & a stunning modern hostess kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances.
Also on offer are 3 bedrooms, 3 light filled living areas, GDH & a large decked entertaining area which is a great place to sit back & enjoy the fresh country air.
Outside you will find a fully fenced & useable 1/4 acre with plenty of room for your four legged friends & kids to play.
If you are looking for a quality home in the hills then look no further.
Call today to inspect!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

Classic Charm
This original hills cottage has a warm & welcoming atmosphere
throughout from the moment you enter. The current owners say this is a home that hugs you when you arrive home & it sure is a pleasure to inspect! Set on approx 1/2 an acre, the home sits proudly overlooking valley vistas & the creek which meanders through creating the perfect haven for birds & other wildlife. There are 2 bedrooms, 2 living areas, gas heating plus there are arch & leadlight windows reminiscent of by gone era. Relax on the deck & loose yourself in total serenity... call us & inspect today!
Lana Maher : 0408 535 075

Welcome To The Property Market
Beautifully presented & located within walking distance to the shops, transport, schools & sporting facilities, this double brick home will impress those looking for a first home, investment or low maintenance lifestyle!
Boasting 2 bedrooms with BIR, open plan living, gas heating, front verandah, plus cat run & double carport - all set on a private fenced 1/4 acre allotment.
Hurry, this will sell fast!
Lana Maher : 0408 535 075

Character and Charm
Nestled on a flat and useable 1/4 of an acre and surrounded by mature gardens is this lovely weatherboard home that has been stylish updated. Offering 3 large bedrooms, open plan kitchen/dining area, spacious bathroom with spa, gas wall furnace, coonara & a sun drenched lounge room. This home offers privacy and is within walking distance of everything the beautiful hills town of Cockatoo has to offer. Call today inspection is a must!!!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

Don't Miss This One!!!
Immaculate presentation both inside & out is a feature of this delightful 3 bedroom cedar weatherboard home. Nestled on a fully fenced & level block of almost a 1/3 of an acre which offers established gardens to ensure privacy away from neighbours and multiple outdoor zones that are a great place to sit back and relax and enjoy the beauty that surrounds. With absolutely no work needed you will be happy to find that the home offers 2 separate
living areas, light filled kitchen, high ceilings & coonara. Call today homes this good don't last!!!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

'Paradise' - 1/2 acre, big shed, immaculate home!
Surrounded by lush greenery & established European trees is this perfectly presented split level weatherboard home on approx. 1/2 an acre. From the moment you enter, this is a home that says 'welcome', high ceilings, open plan living, soothing colour schemes, timber floorboards & a picture perfect view from every window. Boasting 2 wood fires, air conditioning, 3 double sized bedrooms with BIR's plus there is a large covered outdoor entertaining area at the rear, private decking at the front, mains & tank water, huge shed (triple garage with extra height & width, concrete floor & power), plenty of parking space, veggie patch & a fully fenced yard for the pets. Walk to the shops, transport & enjoy the peace & privacy of being located on a no through road! Hurry to inspect - the vendor says 'SELL'!!!
Lana Maher : 0408 535 075

Great Value Family Home!
This brick family home boasts plenty of room for the growing family, with 3 large bedrooms, master with ensuite & WIR, functional kitchen with adjoining family room, large lounge with open fire place & meals area.
Outside you will find a useable corner block of almost 1/3 of an acre that offers dual access, fenced yard, double garage with concrete floor & power, triple carport, a covered entertaining area & established garden.
Call today, inspection is a must!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

6 Acres-Suite horses, and 2 Houses!
Lots of options here, Rolling grassland, well fenced for horses or similar, delightful location, beautiful garden. Close to the Cockatoo Montessori school. The main house is a 3 bedroom brick veneer with en suite bathroom, and the character filled mud brick cottage is quite separate and self contained. There is a double garage in brick to match the house and a paved outdoor area. The road access is very easy and the northern aspect gives great light and panoramic and uninterrupted views of the Yarra Valley Ranges. This would be a great place to call home or an excellent rental return with the two individual dwellings easily lettable.
Contact Anthony Moyes 0413 581 168
or
For information on this property call 9841 8000
Melways Ref:312 C 3
